summary: Fixed 521 error by killing Next.js process occupying port 3000. Express backend server now running correctly on port 3000. Health endpoint responding via direct connection and Nginx proxy. Cloudflare cache purged. Server is healthy and accessible locally.
current_status: Express server running on port 3000. Health checks passing locally and via Nginx. Cloudflare cache purged. 521 error should resolve as Cloudflare retries connection. All services stable.
